body_html:
Looks like it loads all the libraries, recognizes all the GPUs, but then something strange happens.
How does tensorflow decide if the cuda driver version is insufficient?
There is another program, which works fine on GPU, so I suppose the problem is on the tensorflow side.

body:

How does tensorflow decide if the cuda driver version is insufficient?
There is another program, which works fine on GPU, so I suppose the problem is on the tensorflow side.
